intro: A whimsical romantic comedy centered around the Maid Club!
description:
Mitsuru Kichijoji, who transitioned from a salaryman to an art instructor at his alma mater.
He thought his duties would only involve teaching but he is unexpectedly forced to take over as the advisor for the "Maid Club," a role left by his predecessor!
Reluctantly accepting the key and heading to the club room, Mitsuru soon discovers that the Maid Club is facing a variety of issues...

Only two members!! A budget of just 5,000 yen!!
If they can't win the club budget scramble, the Maid Club will be disbanded...!
In the midst of this crisis threatening the Maid Club's survival, an alien from the Maid Training Star joins the club!?
And what are the Three Sacred Maid Artifacts? And who is the mysterious Dark Maid Association that seeks them...?

Will the Maid Club be able to overcome the countless challenges that lie ahead?


・Nana Akamizawa
A member of the Maid Club who is a bit... no, quite absent-minded.
Despite that, she is a hardworking person who cleans the school entrance every morning and never fails to greet both students and teachers.

・Yuri Alphine
An excellent maid-in-training alien who came from the "Maid Training Star".
She has antenna-like appendages growing from her head.

・Mie Kurosagawa
A member of the maid club who is very good at cooking and has somewhat a relaxed manner of speaking.
The way she speaks reflects her very laid-back personality.

・Nagisa Saeki
A school nurse who has been transferred about two months ago.
Always accompanied by her groupies (male students captivated by her), she often interferes with the maid club.

・Mitsuru Kichijoji
The protagonist, who has transitioned from a salaryman to a teacher at his alma mater.
Due to the handover from his predecessor, he is reluctantly forced to become the advisor for the maid club.
